name: WASTELAND WAR
description:
WASTELAND WAR

A long time ago, as planet Adoy turned into a dry wasteland, it's people formed factions to try and survive. Today, as more and more of the planet becomes uninhabitable, they are running out of space to live and battle over the little space that is left.

Made in 2 days for the 2021 MegaJam, organized by Epic Games/Unreal Engine, this Lego Star Wars 3-inspired game lets you command troops from the frontlines of battle. Buils barracks to get more troops and overwhelm the enemy, sneak behind enemy lines while they're distracted by your army, or even build a barrack behind enemy territory. With three difficulties that change the layout, and randomized starting battlefields each round, the game offers great replayability.

The game can be played with either keyboard or controller. Controls are as follows:

WASDLEFT JOYSTICKWALKLEFT SHIFTX / SQUAREATTACK
LEFT CTRLB / CIRCLEBUILDSPACEA / XJUMP
